title: Great Customer Care Smooth Check-in and -out
text:
We arrived tired and a little worse for wear after our flights were cancelled. 
 
We reserved our room on line. Our reservation was found quickly in the system I was asked for ID and the cared used and we were given our rooms quickly.

We had an issue with a clogged toilet and the poor gentleman was the only person aside from housekeeping and he was doing it all and well, might I add.

He said it would be handled quickly and minutes after I returned to my room a small crew of gentlemen arrived and we had no more issues after.

Everything was clean and neat. If you don’t have toiletries (we had our own, so we left theirs for you. Lol) they had plenty as a courtesy in the restroom. Minimal, but beautiful asthetic. We saw a couple enjoying the hot tub during the unseasonably cold weather, and I did see the nice gym on the first floor. We were only there one night so we did not have the opportunity to utilize them. 

Seems like a really nice and modern establishment.

We were treated well.

Thank you!

title: Garbage
text: Wishing I could give it a zero star. Booking has this tendency where you would open up the flights tab and for some odd reason it starts the calendar on the month in advance. (Ex. Its the month of February and it pulls the calendar for March). Normally I catch this and stop myself from going through the actual booking. My friend is not well and I was only able to work my job’s schedule around to see him. I rushed quickly to find a flight for him. I booked my flight with intentions of leaving the next morning. I get to the airport running back and forth from the ticket booth to the check in just to get told that I booked for the month in advance. Typically I would look away from this thing. but now just to cancel or even get a refund Im getting taxed. It seems a little like an indirect way of fooling you as if the majority of governments already do in this modern world.

title: Wonderful stay in the hearth of Sapareva Vanya
text: It has been a wonderful stay for all of us and we thank for the warm welcome and personal treatment by the hosts. The apartment is very spacious and has everything you need for a convenient and relaxing stay (including coffee for the coffee machine ;)). It has 2 bedrooms with separate bathrooms and spacious dining and living room. The apartment is owned by a family who also owns the pizza restaurant close by which offers authentic Italian pizza (very yummy, worth trying it, but make sure you call to book a table on the weekends). It was very nice of the hosts to do a late checkout without any fee. Strongly recommend this place especially for larger families or 2 couples.

title: تقييم Evaluation
text: تطبيق ممتاز ، وفر الكثير من الوقت والجهد في البحث عن اقامة مناسبه من حيث الموقع والسعر والمساحة والخدمات الفندقية وايضا الامان وسهولة طريقة الدف الامنه والاختيارات المناسبة بالاستعانة بتصنيف الفنادق الشقق والفيلات والاستعانة بفائدة التعليقات وشرح خدمات وادوات المرفق والشروط المتعاقد عليها في فتره زمنية لاتتعدى الدقائق وايضا التوجيه عبر استخدام الاتجاهة بستخدام تطبيقات الغوغل ماب وغيره Excellent application, save a lot of time and effort in the search for suitable accommodation in terms of location, price, space and hotel services as well as safety and ease of the safe mode of duff and the appropriate choices by categorizing the hotels apartments and villas and the use of useful comments and explain the services and tools of the facility and conditions contracted in a period of time not exceeding minutes and guidance Using trend using Google Map and other applications

title: New haven inn is exceptional
text: When you walk up to the place, you can will see it’s a small, cozy, calm place, when I checked in, the receptionist and I believe to be owner received us with a big contagious smile and was very helpful giving us ideas of what to see, where to eat and what to do. When I walked into my room, i felt like I never left home, everything was well maintained, clean and had a great sense of style. The bed was soft and comfortable and I didn’t have to turn any heater to keep me warm because the blankets were good quality. Totally recommend this place! The price is worth it and you will have a peaceful rest in the town.. when you walk outside you can see all the stars in the sky.

title: Wingate by Wyndham on Shackleford Road
text: This was one of the best hotels I ever stayed at. They had all the amenities that a person would need to have a pool breakfast in the morning computer , to use a work out room. They covered everything they have a washer and dryer there to wash your clothes they have excellent customer service, my cousins recommend at this hotel for me. I was traveling from California and they did not let me down rooms are clean. Everything was working. I can’t hush enough – about how much I love this hotel and will tell everyone about it including my family and I’m coming back in two years to stay again. I was very impressed.

title: Simple, effective and transparent. Love it.
text: So glad I have started booking through this app and website the Customer Service 800 wise and the app of the family are friendly, as well as offers, best deals and transparency in Cost and is just delightful and absolutely user-friendly I book properties, often for work purposes, and convention, attendance as well as Professional seminars, the app 800 Customer Service and even the front desk employees at two properties that I’ve stayed at in the past two weeks have been absolutely delightful. Sincerely hope it remains and impeccable experience that it has been already. Thank you so much.

title: Misleading
text: Click on a hotel that said free cancellation, but when I go to cancel it says I chose the no cancellation policy option (who would choose that?) and I’m being charged the total of the room as my cancellation fee. I did however choose the option to pay later, as in when I got there, but they charged me now. Figured they just needed a credit card on file just in case, but no they lied on that too. Ask to have the fee waived, don’t even ask why, just state they’ll send me their response in 48hrs. Now the listing doesn’t have the free cancellation statement on it. I should have just found a place when I get to my destination this weekend instead of booking ahead. Thought I could try and save time and money for myself, but if they don’t “approve” my fee waiver, I’ll be out almost 200$ out of my travel budget and end up paying for somewhere else.

title: Love this place. Friend owner. She is very nice 😊
text: This place is great to stay with family. My husband love this place safe and they have guard 24 hours and I saw they have guard walk around every 3 hours to check. Hot water is great and walk distance to laundry mat and few minutes to gaisano which is they have groceries and shopping store. And jollibee and other fast food. And the place is so quiet and my husband he easy to recover from his jet lag because the place is comfortable and quiet. Live this place. We planned coming back in two year we plan stay same place. Thank you for the owner so friendly and helpful😊😊🤗🥰 see you until next time.

title: Convenient up-to-date hotel openings.
text: This is our go to app for locating and reserving hotels and we’ve always been able to find hotels that are suitable to our needs and, many times, at prices lower than others. This app has proven more useful than we’d had imagined, e.g., during our daughter’s cheer competition which lasted two, instead one, days causing our to require a second night’s stay not only were we able to find an available room nearby (less than 2-3 miles) but at a better hotel (4 instead of 3 star) at a lower price. We’ll continue using this app because of it’s wide selection of hotels with no apparent bias or preference toward any particular brand.

title: Cancelling my confirmed booking
text: I use this app for all my hotel bookings and I will never even open it again. After booking my accommodation and receiving a confirmation from both the Hotel and Booking I received an email from booking’s customer service that the hotel made a mistake when pricing and they increased the price of the room. (5x the price i booked). They told me if i do not accept the new rate they will automatically cancel my booking. They are costing me a none refundable flight ticket as well as a rejected hayya card. Im not going to have any trust with booking through your app again. Its not professional to cancel my reservation within 48 hours without any acceptable justification nor giving me any alternative accommodation within the same price range and quality or even any kind of compensation. It really is very unprofessional, unfair, disrespectful and disappointing.

title: Trips
text: I went to Istanbul for a few days on a business trip. After looking at many hotels in the area decided to choose this one, it was probably one of the best decisions I have ever made on my trip there. From the moment I entered to the moment I left the hotel everything was amazing. Turkish hospitality is very famous and this hotel really provides that to the fullest. The rooms were spacious, showers were very clean, hotel staff was always there when I needed them. They even helped me find the best restaurants and best places to shop in the area and help get me a taxi. This is a truly 5 star hotel. I will be sure to recommend it to all my friends and family and love to return again.

title: Studio 6 center park drive. West palm beach fl.
text: I had the most pleasant encounter with Miss as one of the houses as studio six when I had an unfortunate booking complication. Mrs. S.  Fixed the mixup between two different Studio sixes on two different streets in two different cities and made it effortlessly and pleasant no upsetting us she calm me fix the situation with an under 10 minutes had me into my room no concerns no arguments nothing. I have never met somebody so sweet and nice we’re such a horrible situation as money and booking to another location and being able to settle the situation within her on being as an employee thank you so much the date is January 8, 2023

title: Great idea, so-so execution
text:
Location, ambiance, decor - are all at a high level, as advertised.
However, service is not.
Room windows do not open, which while grudgingly tolerable at a Holliday Inn, is a huge negative at a premium, boutique hotel - at a super premium price point they maintain.
Upon arrival, we found no hangers in the closet, and a locked safe that could not be used. It took a call to fix both issues.
On the first day of our stay, the room was serviced/cleaned only in the late evening, and then only when we complained at the front desk after returning around 6 pm to a messy room, as we left it in the morning.
Furthermore, we realized only on the third and the last night, that there is a rather pleasant room turndown protocol, that involves soothing ambient music and an aromatherapy lava lamp - shame that nobody bothered to do this the first two nights.
Finally, experience with the valet parking (expensive, outsourced, and only form of parking available through the hotel) is mixed at best. There’s one attendant available at a time, so if there’s more than one or two guests waiting for their cars, there can be a 15-20 min wait. On several occasions, there was a clear lack of communication between the hotel staff and the valet parking staff, resulting in confusion, and further delays.

title: extremely amazing
text:
This place is a dream, the view, the sea is right there, the room where I stayed is out of the conventional ( you can take amazing pictures in that room) food is amazing, mouthwatering.

 Daniel, and his staff are great people, always making sure you are having a great time. And let me tell you about the drinks, My God!!, You have to try “the coco loco” and have one for me, lol. This place is a must and definitely I am coming back. I travel a lot and this is the first time I leave a review, and that says it all. 

Daniel, thank you so much for everything, as I told you before, you have an amazing beautiful place and your staff is priceless.

title: Amazing Hotel
text:
I stayed during July 4th holiday and my check in process was flawless and quick. During our stay the hotel protocol with city /state that we wear mask in hotel and social distance - all workers were wearing masks and gloves and constantly cleaning all surfaces as well as hand sanitizer everywhere they took all precautions and I felt safe.
The beach was steps away and SO beautiful the beach attendants were helpful but ran out of beach towels and chairs but that really was not an issue as there were spots at the pool.
Family oriented and pet friendly. The beds were comfortable and rooms were clean and had a mini kitchen 
BOOK this hotel you will love it and location was perfect! I’m coming back soon.

title: La Quinta Inn Corpus Christi North
text: The hotel was terrible. The room was dirty, the shower and the bathroom floors were disgusting. There were hairs and dirt in all the corners & the shower had so much soap scum we wore flip flops to shower. The bathroom hadn’t been cleaned in a long time. The AC did not work in the room at all. We had stayed at La Quinta before and it was great this was the opposite. When we checked in the desk clerk was not nice or even remotely thankful for our business. We were interrupting whatever she had been doing. Once we got to room we had 1 towel for 3 guests.  The AC until top was dirty with bugs, dirt, hair & what appeared to be food all over it. The door to the room did not seal correctly; when closed you could see about an inch of light coming through at the bottom half. The free breakfast was not offered in any form unlike it stated on reservation request. Overall we were very disgusted and disappointed in the quality of this hotel location.

title: AMAZING!!!
text: This is literally the BEST hostel I have ever stayed in!!!! Ms. hang and Mr. Duc who worked at the hotel were so welcoming and hospital. Mr. Duc also was very friendly and gave me a lot of good information about Hanoi. The Hostel/hotel : wow the beds are CLEAN with a comfortable mattress, pillow, and comforter. Free WiFi. You get your own shared bathroom/shower with the hostel and it’s soo clean and fresh: this is exactly what I needed after 4 Kong’s days of motor biking in the mountains. Very relaxing . I will be back .. I actually stayed here twice in one week between mine excursions .. indo not remember the name of the other person at the desk when I arrived but he was also amazing and arranged a car to pick me up - everything went smoothly. I give this hostel a 10 !

title: App is great
text: All information is at your fingertips and it is fast. Today, I have to make changes and I was helped by the apartment staff  that I had booked and a wonderful live person for Booking contacted me. The one problem I find is that the app and the fotos for the apartments or hotel rooms do not necessarily match. There are many choices in the App; each choice should let you navigate to the photos that are for the specific choice one wants. I found fotos that do not belong to the apartment or hotel room. It becomes confusing trying to match your choice apartment/room with the pictures so one knows the exact apartment/room to be booked. Everything else is excellent!! Thank you!

title: Embassy suites hotel Hilton okc
text: Embassy suites hotel Hilton is amazing! Staff goes above and beyond to help! Straight out of hospital from a   transplant and they have been so kind and understanding about cleaning so much! Breakfast downstairs i is s top notch with wonderful staffing and made to order items too. U can eat downstairs or bag it and take to ur room. People all keep social distancing very well and most everyone have masks on except when at table.  Doesn’t matter to me or not since because that’s a person personal choice since not currently mandated most places. Due to my surgery I’m glad they do! I’m blessed and this hotel is 5 stars👍😊😍❤️💪🦋🥘🥓🥞🏆🎖🥇🏅🎗🎸🎰✈️🌠💻💎🧻🛌🎈🪞🎉🧧💝 Love it!

title: Not very happy
text: My concern is that the lady at the front desk calls and says we have to leave at noon O’clock. I have already booked again through 3rd party and the lady at front desk calls and says I’ll have to cancel it and leave today. After going to speak with the front desk I had an attitude with lady there. Telling me that manager requested us leave bc of a report from 3rd shift but of sketchy activity. I then responded to her that me and my friend staying, went to Waffle House across the street for breakfast. That I would like to speak to manager and that 3rd party doesn’t refund a cancellation on booking. She replied that there is no way to speak with a manager that we need to leave today. I’m very upset, and would recommend not to stay here bc of lazyness. I don’t know why people even have a job if they don’t enjoy it and can’t satisfy there guests. Or atleast try. Absurd.

title: Postojna , Hotel Jama
text:
We are on vacation from US and we have no reservations for hotels along the way. Always finding it on trip advisor as we travel. 
Last night we picked up room in Hotel Jama in Postojna. Absolutely loved it. From arrival to departure everyone was great. Room was 1st class. Very clean, spacious, fantastic view. Last night we enjoyed great conversation with the bartender Andre. Such a nice guy. Speaks very good English. This morning we had very good breakfast. Short walk to visit Postojna Jama caves worth seeing. Take a jacket it’s cool inside , take about 1.5 h. Afterward we visited castle . 
Highly recommending not only sightseeing but this hotel and their stuff. Hope you enjoy it as much as we did. 
Dorothy and Alex from Houston.👏🏻😁

title: Great app but has glitches
text: This is the second time that I am booked for a trip for two adults and multiple kids but it only confirms adults. I search for the room prices with kids and when confirming my booking the property only receives a reservation for two adults I arrived at one hotel and had five people with me to a single bed room Since they were so full  they could not accommodate me, my kids had to sleep on the floor in a hotel! I just confirmed another booking and I called the property Ahead of time and they only had me registered for two adults no kids if I wouldn’t have called I would’ve been stuck in the same boat. Plus I couldn’t leave app feedback in the app. Please address bugs. Otherwise great app.

title: Overprice stay on the beach at a decent hotel
text: The staff was really great we had a late check in and I accommodated us with an extra late check out the view kind a wasn’t that great there was construction at the hotel across the street you can still see the sun rise but nobody likes looking at construction when they’re on their balcony so depending on where your room is  you might might not have a beach view the breakfast looked and smelled great but I did not eat there’s a beach access in the back of the lobby and restaurant on site The parking lot was not great and if you can’t find a spot in the small lot that’s on file they have a lot across the street... overall I would’ve paid more attention and rushed to pick something I would’ve stayed at a cheaper hotel with the same accommodations

title: Beautiful highly  recommend
text: The Columbia River cliff house is beautiful. The accommodation is just the right size for two people. I’ve never stayed somewhere where I felt so comfortable,  just like home. They allowed me to book in earlier as I was traveling a long distance and wanted to freshen up before a family Christmas gathering. The bed was so comfortable, I slept like a baby. There’s a hot tub and a great view to top things off. It was very clean and had everything you needed from the fridge, microwave, coffee pot and dishes. I will stay here again when I’m in the area. Told all my family about it, so they can recommend it to friends.

title: Worst.
text:
Worst hotel

This is my fourth and last visit to this hotel. Each visit has gotten worse. The lobby staff are all unkempt and all look like they just rolled out of bed. The ice machines don’t work.  The entire exterior of the property looks like it never receives any maintenance.

This hotel looks like a property that is on its way out but the management is trying to get a few bucks more out of it before shutting it down.

This last visit has been by far the worst hotel stay of my life. The bedsheets were all wrinkled. Every single one of them. The one on the bed, the cover sheet, the comforter, pillow cases,. They all look like they came from another room where they were tossed in a corner overnight then placed on my bed.  To make matters worse, the bed was lopsided to the right.

The toilet bowl was thoroughly stained with “S” marks. The door to the room would not close thoroughly and less you leaned and pushed on it. The colors on the TV were horrific. It appears that there’s no quality control at this property whatsoever.

I was almost tempted to go sleep in my car.

To the property owners: Realize when enough is enough. It is time for you to either shut this hotel down or completely revamp it.

The time has come. 

This hotel is perfectly located but it appears that the owners are unaware of this jewel that they have.

title: Some troubles…but everything was resolved
text:
The king suite is designed a little backward. The king room is in the back of the hotel room with no windows. The sitting room is in the front with the stunning view of The Island ferris wheel. With the bedroom being in the back, it is a very warm room that the air conditioning doesn’t necessarily get to went to the front desk explain the situation, and after several minutes a phone calls and trying to solve the issue. We were finally able to move into a room with the air conditioner next to the bed. Thank you SHERIKE for being able to handle the tough situation! 

Signing out- an insomniac who struggles to sleep and even more so on vacation.

title: Terrible
text: Horrible experience , I’ve been a loyal customer to booking . Many trip with them and never had to complain . This weekend I book a trip to Vegas and the hotel was horrible , room dirty , noise like you can’t imagine all night . For the first time I ask a refund to booking since it was anything like it should have be . It’s been 4 days that they put me on hold for hours . No manager call me back . Nothing has been done yet . I understand from if it was someone who always call to ask refund but it’s not the case it’s the first time on my side on more than 10 trip . Anyway I will never book with them again , I was thinking reserving with a third part will assure you to don’t deal with all this crap , I was wrong . Booking act like a scammer. Spend an extra 20 box and reserve directly with the hotel you will have more insurance like that.

title: Worst Vacation
text: I’m currently on Vacation & the hotel I booked had false advertisement on their website so I call booking to see if I can get a discount or be moved since I did pay alot of money. Once I get to the lobby in order to have the hotel speak to the booking representative I realize the lobby is full with people complaining of mold & ed bugs. I decide I want to leave so the hotel agrees to refund me w/o charges. I was told I would get the money into my cars automatically & I could go get the cash at 8am for a new hotel they agreed that I would be able to pay in the morning. Now I call in the morning & they tell me I can’t get the money until I talk to someone from corporate & a check be mailed out. The representative from Booking whom spoke to them was super rude & uninterested in what we are going through. It’s 4th of july, there are no banks opened & we have no cash on us to pay the new hotel. THANKS BOOKING.

title: Worst booking site!!!!!!! RUN
text: I gave booking one last try! This will be my second time they messed up my vacation!!!! I originally booked for 2 people getting 10% off and mobile app price. I just recently went to look at details being that the date is getting closer and realized they only booked me for 1 person. So it was no problem adding the extra person but then they charged me double the amount from the original price I booked for. I took a screen shot of it and submitted it for proof and they are lying to my face saying they don’t see that price ever being offered. So how the h*ll do I have a screen shot then. I just cancelled my reservation through them because they are a very shady company!!!!! They don’t have value for their customers and don’t honor their deals especially when they make the mistake. Use a different company!!!!!

title: I didn’t get what I paid for 🤔
text: I was very displeased with the service or should I say lack of service. I will never use Wonder vacation home rentals again. I was given several contact numbers but was never able to get anyone. There were dead roaches on the floor and a some crawling around. There was no replenishing of the paper products such toilet paper and trash bags. Location was the only good thing about this place. Advertised a private pool with the home look like it hadn’t been cleaned in a while. The first day I arrived I asked for this to be cleaned but no one ever showed after two days of texting yes texting I figured I make the best of it because I felt like I was spending more time trying to get them to give what paid for than actually enjoying my trip. I decided I would try to take care of it when I return. So disappointed I planned and saved up for trip and home was a big part.

title: Zero Stars
text: If I could give them a zero I would. I booked with them while I was out of town for work, and had a charity marathon to attend in another state. I made the initial mistake by booking the wrong week without realizing — working 15 hours a day for en entire week will do that to you — so I drive for about 5 hours, get to the hotel at 3am, and they don’t have a room for me. Again, that was my fault. However, I immediately issued a cancellation online, and went to another hotel. The email I got from them basically said “we are reviewing your request, and will get back to you.” I never heard from them again until the day after my (incorrect) reservation. So essentially I booked with them, requested a cancellation 5 hours later, and they decided to ignore me until it was too late to refund my money. The reservation I accidentally made was for a week later, so it wasn’t a last minute cancellation.

title: Great app for travelers worldwide
text: I’ve used this app to book our stays throughout Italy, and was amazed at each property we stayed at.   We usually got an entire apartment during our stay, and it averaged about $80/nt.    This app offers really reasonable rates at awesome properties.   After booking several stays, they even give you a ‘genius’ discount!   I’ve now booked stays in Mexico, and throughout the Southern states, as I am planning a long road trip.   The place I booked in the French Quarter (NOLA) looks fantastic, at an incredible rate.  What I love is all the info they provide for each property, including location on map.   This is my go-to travel app.

title: Careful of scammers
text:
This app allows motels to be on their list even if they have repeatedly stole people’s money. I got charged $200 by a hotel for cleaning fee? And booking refuse to have anything to do with it. They should not allow every scammer on their website and they should filter the properties so us, the customers don’t get robbed. Terrible
And no, I don’t want to talk to your customer service. I already talked to them and they said you can’t help. The hotel took the money and there’s nothing you can do, that’s what your rep said. I uninstalled the app and am not going to download it again to talk to your useless customer service. 
Just check the hotels in your website. Booking used to mean I was getting a place to stay that has been peer reviewed and deemed ok. Now I will never trust it again since that property should not be on your website.

title: Exceptional App!
text: I have traveled between Hawaii, (Japan) Tokyo, Osaka, Kyoto, (South Korea)Busan, Seoul, and Deagu. Every time I traveled I had a group of friends with me and I did all the booking for us, this app has made everything so convenient and stress free. I have always found the cheapest/good quality places on this app. FYI I don’t use it to book flights. I love that they honor the free cancellation policy and make everything so clear and easy to use. There are plenty of reviews, ratings, and pictures that I always feel comfortable booking a place that all my friends will be happy with. There are so many filters to use that you can narrow your search down to the tiniest amenities. 5 stars for sure.

title: User friendly app
text: I booked my room for my daughters graduation almost a month in advance and today I got an email reminder informing me that my trip is coming up and provided me with the opportunity to change my reservation if I needed to. However I am pleased with my choice so far so no changes were made. The app is super easy to navigate so great job on selecting your web designer/app designer! I do however which we wld get text messages informing us customers that our trip is coming up because I am retired and I don’t really use my email and it would be much easier for everyone to look and receive text notifications! Thanks for listening!

title: Don’t stay here!
text:
The pool was much too small and too warm. It closes very early and all around it people were so loud screaming, pushing each other in and the lifeguard did barely anything. 
Our room was next to a very large extended family that were incredibly loud. They were constantly screaming at each other and I could hear them through my bedroom window even though it stayed closed. It was especially bad in the bathroom where we had a window that would not close. 
The breakfast was not very good. And children were running around there as well. The pastries were mediocre at best and it left a lot to be desired. While the staff tried to clean up the breakfast trash there was so much food on the ground they did not sweep up. 
Also when we told someone at the front desk about our dissatisfaction with our stay they said “they could not control other people”. 
Do not stay here

title: A week of total satisfaction!!!
text: First time to visit Japan with my wife and very lucky indeed to book and stayed in this hotel!!! It’s centrally located, so accessible to the train station , sorrounded by excellent and good restaurants , hotel staff are so accommodating and very helpful with directions and knowledgeable and daily supplies with toiletries, facial creams and breakfast has lots of selections , good coffee and a very reasonable hotel rates!!!! This is a very highly recommended hotel in Tokyo area and will definitely come back and stay here again and again!!!! Thank you so much Booking. Com for a well deserved treat!!! To the staff of the hotel, hats off to you all!!!! Arigato and Sayonara!!!!!

title: 10/10!  Gorgeous hotel and very clean!!
text: 10/10! Amazing view and a beautiful hotel.  As a busy family with kids in sports and work, my husband and I rarely sit down together alone with quiet.  We sat in front of the double sided fireplace for hours relaxing.  Complimentary coffee all day was a bonus.  I love the high-end-rustic  “low country look” that they have.  There is gorgeous hardwood flooring and built in shelving throughout.  The tall ceilings with extensive wood trimmings are amazing.  The waterfront view from the lounge is so pretty.  I was nervous to book because we had never visited this property but when we come back we will stay here again.

title: Less than happy
text:
The hotel booked was already fully booked, Labor Day weekend. The facility called immediately and let us know. Well the charge was over $800 and the refund just got to me 7 Oct!! I waited 3-4 weeks waiting for my refund. Then sent a message stating that I was never refunded. First response was it was too long and the facility never let them know it was canceled. The facility had no issues, right away stated I never stayed there and gave me a reference number. I messaged again with the number asking for my refund. It said I should here back within 5 days. It was another 2 times a week apart with no response when finally I got a message stating that they had never known about this!!! 

Issues happen, no biggy. The fact that it took 2 months of constantly sending messages and just being ignored was an absolute joke!

title: Bookings did not help at all when the airline canceled my flight and prepaid hotel reservation
text:
It is amazing now in the resurgence of travel that you can’t find a company willing to fight for their customer versus protecting their profitability. I tried canceling at the Hilton hotel at Munich Airport when British Air canceled my flight and rescheduled me on an earlier flight. Hilton said I had to cancel through Booking where I made the reservation. Then Booking said I had to contact Hilton to get it canceled. Everyone points their finger to everyone else and not trying to help their customer. I will not use a 3rd party travel company because of lack of service and Booking is an example of a company not standing behind their customer. Good luck when the travel industry gets back to normal and you have to fight to get customers. I won’t be there for you.
With kindness.
Kevin Ekar

title: Easy to Use and All My Reservations Available Instantly
text: Very easy and intuitive use. Easy to sort and filter properties where we are traveling. Plenty of ratings that evaluate various items about the property. Honest and upfront prices are quoted with all taxes, etc. Once booked it provides a dashboard of all reserved locations, dates, whether prepaid or not, addresses, phone numbers and photos and map assisting location of the properties once you have arrived. Also has a messaging system to communicate directly with property managers. You can also convert bookings into PDFs and save in documents as well. Easy cut and past to place into other itinerary documents.

title: Birthday Stay
text: My other half and I had a wonderful stay at Zenmotel. It exceeded our expectations! The place was clean, spacious and in an awesome location. All beaches were no more than 15 minutes from us, including South Beach and North beach. Wynnewood was 5 minutes up the road. Free parking was great with us having a rental car. The housekeeper Lucy is wonderful and more than happy to assist with refreshing our room. A/C was wonderful and blew cold and the shower water was hot! Sheldon, the owner, greeted us and allowed us to check in earlier than expected. He told us where all of the great spots were and showed us around the motel. We sincerely enjoyed or stay here and will stay here every time we visit Miami!

title: Holiday Season and working out of town
text: Awesome find especially for the last minute. I was involved in a wreck about 3 wks ago and I have friends over in that area who was so generous to let me leave my out of commission car at their house and then we are going to get a tow dolly and take it back home to Ms. The hotel is extremely close to the uhaul dealer and the busted up car. I just hope that the hotel is going to be as it’s been advertising clean and quiet is all that I ask for bc husband and son worked today and I packed and gave our 2 furbabies good bathes so they smell good and and they better keep their promise to have us 3 tired people and my 2 babies a room that is PAWS FRIENDLY.

title: Hair in the bed do not stay
text: So after a grueling 14 hour ride back home to salem nh I decide to stay at La Quinta because supposedly recently renovated!  First of all it’s still in the midst of renovation.  After making our way into the hotel.  We get our keys only to have the hardest time to get Into the dang room.  Once in the tv isn’t working.  Decide well it’s a crappy day I’m going to shower and regroup and go out shopping. Hoping when we got back things would be rectified.  Well tv is on so I decide to get into bed.  But before I put back sheets just to check for cleanliness.  Holy crap. Hairs all over the sheets.  I’m disgusted.  I truly cannot stay at this place as I’m physically getting ill.  Go downstairs and speak with Jordan who states he is going to look at the room himself.  Not charging me as well. Quite honestly that wasn’t even an option.  Look closely at what you pay for.   Really closely cause that’s just gross!!

title: Booking is da Bomb Baby!
text:
It has all of the various types of accommodations easily filtered for your preferences. A good discount for Genius level One at 10% is brilliant! The interface is perfect and the prices and choices are consistently good. Searching for flights and cars is intuitive and the site makes it easy to store your travel data. 

Download the free app Tripit and set it up so your emails CC Tripit and you will have a well-organized, meaningful and rewarding vaca with an itinerary to share with your family. Plus, keeping things on one travel site like Booking has a lot of benefits. The addition of Tripit is the icing. Happy travels!

title: Review of our stay,we’d go back again!
text: Room was clean and the hotel was easy to find, close to the bus station and close to the major attractions in Firenze. The room was somewhat stifling when we first arrived, but easy to figure the climate control in the room. Unfortunately the air conditioning until began to leak large amounts of water so we had to turn off. We arrived late at night, so the receptionist was a little rude for being woken up so late and annoyed at us for using the doorbell too much. The bed was not a single full bed but two twins put together. Bathroom was clean, the room can be loud in the morning due to the street traffic. Otherwise, great value for the cost.

title: It just works.
text: I do believe there is some room for improvement. But I really can’t come up with anything specific to say as to what. Basically, the app works. Hence my 5 star rating. If something works perfectly, and doesn’t leave you hanging, so much so that you barely notice that you ever used it (since I usually start in Google Maps or TripAdvisor and I am automatically redirected to the app (essentially an intermediary step)), then there is nothing to complain about. I’d say: Keep it up development team. It works. Thank you for making an app that gets things done without any issues. Best, Raphael.

title: WORST COSTUMER SERVICE.
text: What terrible customer service they have. We have been calling for 3 days to change a flight and they couldn’t do it. First, the people answering the calls are not trained to speak English. You hardly understand what they say. Second, all they did was say that they can’t access the system or that they can’t help you. The most ridiculous thing is that they wanted to charge us $979 to change the tickets to a different date; even though, a new ticket through the airline cost around $300. I do not understand why one pays for travel insurance when it cannot be used because they only want to scam you. In the end, we contacted the airline directly and we ended up paying $230 for the change. So, don't waste your time paying extra for travel insurance or buying a ticket through this company

title: Horrible customer service
text: Do not book with them. We had reserved a room though Booking and they never submitted our reservation to the hotel! When we arrived we were told we do not ha e a reservation and no rooms were available. In short after talking on the phone with them for an hour they took no responsibility and told us we would need to book another hotel on our own, pay for it (even though they have already took our money), and no discount or work on there end would be provided! As everyone knows last minute bookings are more expensive than booking in advance, so a cheap room in the downtown area was double what it was when were looking months ago! So we had to stay out of town and waste multiple hours of our vacation dealing with their error that to tool no responsibility for! HORRIBLE Company!
